transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan madam ab batao.
Customer: Haan ji Rishabh ji aap aa gaye system pe?
Executive: Hmm system me hi hu mai to bolo.
Customer: Theek hai, aap mujhe mail id bhi bata denge kya usme mai aapko google meet ka link share kar deti hu.
Executive: Madam video call pe aana padega kya?
Customer: Ah nahi aap off video karke bhi aap matlab usse present kar sakte ho please.
Executive: Phone pe to aap ho na.
Customer: Haan madam matlab mai mobile se dekh raha hu matlab abhi to wo.
Customer: Aap mobile se dekh rahe ho? Koi baat nahi chaliye mai aise hi bata deti hu koi nahi. Usme aap na jo aap bata rahe the first of all aapka maine activity wala chart bhi dekha hai ki aap kis time me jyadatar lead consumption kar rahe ho. To jo lead aapne consume kari I think relevant hi consume kari honge na jo aapko relevant samajh aayi hai portal pe.
Executive: Madam wo jaise jo apna account manager hai wo mujhe samjhata hai ki aap alag alag state ki lead consume kar lo taaki apan us state me upar aane lag jaaye bhale hi wo chhoti ho badi ho hai na.
Executive: To ab wo wali cheez apan kar rahe hai taaki jyada state me dikhenge utna jyada business aayega.
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Nahi mai us point pe to nahi bol rahi hu wo cheez unhone batai sahi batai kyuki agar aap zero consume karoge to kuch generate hi nahi hogi CTR aapki. To at least agar aapko kuch dikh rahi hai to wo consume karke generate kar pao hai na CTR.
Executive: But madam mere ko aisa lagta hai ki agar ye system operated hai to agar apan chhoti lead consume kar rahe hai to dekho apan wo manufacturing me na chhote order nikal nahi sakte wo wali baat hai.
Customer: Haan mai wo jaanti hu isiliye hi to aapko mai do teen parameter bata rahi hu taaki aapko wo bulk lead mil paaye matlab aisa nahi mai keh rahi hu ki aapko retail hi consume karna hai mai us solution pe hi baat karne aa rahi hu jo aapko bulk wala aapka concern hai usse hi kaise bulk lead hum nikal sakte hai uske liye bata rahi hu. Aap usme first of all mai aapka jo isme checking time jo aap dekhte ho na mujhe lagta hai jitna samajh aa raha hai aap jyadatar phone se hi aap dekh rahe ho hai na phone se use kar rahe ho sari cheeze. Sir usme na aapke jo product line hai product line me aapka yaha pe bulk lead bahut jaldi isme consume hoti hai aur aap agar time line apna dekhoge to aapka time line jo mujhe is month ka dikha raha hai char ghante andar jo aapne lead consume kari hai wo 42% lead consume kari hai 42%.
Customer: Aur jis time pe aapka isko aapka ye jo percentage tha char ghante ke andar ka 73% tha August me June me 71 tha jabki hamare 80 plus hona chahiye percentage aur aap jyadatar jo lead consume kar rahe ho na aap char ghante ke baad wali kar rahe ho char ghante se 24 ghante ke andar ki aur usme aapka aisa nahi keh rahi hu ki aap jyadatar lead next day kar rahe ho same day me hi kar rahe hai but after jo connect ho ja raha hai do teen client se baat ka uske baad aap consume kar rahe ho jo lead aapne consume kari uski baat kar rahi hu aur usme aap jab check kar rahe ho na to bahut sari bulk lead already sold out ho chuki hai jo aap keh rahe ho wo actual me hai aisa but sold out ho chuki hai tab aap dekh pa rahe ho aapke paas waha pe na ek past lead section me aap agar jaoge ek past lead ka ek option leke visible ho raha hai waha pe aapko phone me.
Executive: Kaunsa section?
Customer: Past lead. Past lead yani wo sold out ho chuki hai.
Executive: Latest lead me jau kis me jau?
Customer: By lead jo aapko latest lead ka jo dikh raha hai waha pe aap check karo kahi pe option hai past lead ka.
Executive: Recent tender buyer type saved kaha aa raha hai.
Customer: Ha kyuki system pe dikhata hai iska mujhe confirm karna padega ki aapke usme mobile app me hai ki nahi hai. Sir isiliye mai aapko bol rahi thi ki system pe aap aa jate to mai better bata paati abhi mai aapko agar jaise kuch ye jo ye tender aa rahe hai Panchkula Haryana.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: 100 crore aur ye sab apan nahi kar sakte kya tender inko apan nahi le sakte kya?
Customer: Kar sakte ho aap koi nahi kar sakte hai aap waha pe agar aapko koi bhi aisa kuch tender dikh raha hai jo aapko samajh aa raha hai ki aap itna deliver kara sakte ho to wo aap jaise isme view tender information pe aap click karoge to wo to.
Executive: By lead jo by lead balance hai.
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Jaise madam haa matlab mujhe lagta nahi tha apan tender isse file kar sakte hai mere ko lagta tha ki jaise ye nahi ho pata hoga.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch nahi hai sir waha pe aap agar tender me dealing karna chahte hai ya kar sakte hai to aap ek bar pehle video samajh lijiye us cheez ki ki tender agar aapko idea nahi hai ki tender kaise hota hai to wo wo ek bar aap samajh lijiye fir yaha pe jitne bhi tender aa rahe hai aap usko bhi consume kar sakte hai aapka jo by lead balance hai wo yaha se seedhe seedhe minus hoga ek by lead ka balance aapka ek tender ka information check karne me minus hoga yani ki wo seedhe seedhe waisa hai ki consume kar rahe ho aap koi bhi ek tender ka sari detailing jaise aap by lead consume karne ke liye karte ho to wo waha pe minus hoga. Second thing aap isme aapko har tarah ke tenders dikhata hai ye shayad private bhi kuch tenders honge jo aapke har area ke aap usme filter laga loge apne India ka aap laga lena waise to India ka lagaoge to aapko har area ka dikh jayega agar aap pan India pe kar rahe hai to.
Executive: Haan madam India ka laga ke hi kar raha hu.
Customer: Haan to aapko usme recent wale bhi dikh jayenge purane kitne post hue hai wo sare dikh jayenge aur jaise aapko koi chahiye to usme view tender pe aap click karenge aapko detailing.
Executive: Ek minute chalu rakhenge.
(silence)
Executive: Haan madam.
Customer: Haan ji sir aapne dekh liya tender ghar pe?
Executive: Haan matlab ek tender abhi bhara hai dekhte hai abhi isko padhunga ghar jaake.
Customer: Haan dekh lijiye agar aapko aisa lagta hai ki aap tender me kar sakte hai to aap ya aap whatsapp kar rahe ho kya Saloni naam hai kya aapka?
Customer: Haan ji maine kiya jaise abhi whatsapp aapko kuch usme detail past lead wala jo bata rahi hu wo mujhe dikhana hai jo ki aapko ho sakta hai phone me visible nahi ho raha ho. Mai aapko bas ye samjhana chah rahi hu ki aisa nahi hai ki leads aapke product me nahi hai product me leads hai bas hum thoda sa apna time agar sahi kar lenge kyuki jyadatar problem unhi clients ko aa rahi hai jo sirf app se hi use kar rahe hai kyuki koi bhi lead aati hai.
Executive: Computer chalane se hoga.
Customer: Nahi mai aapko usi ka solution nahi to bata rahi hu usi ka solution hi bata rahi hu ki aap phone pe reh kar ke hi kaise use kar sakte hai mai aapko uske solution hi bata rahi hu aap sunoge aap agar dusre way me lekar ke jaoge to mujhe aapko solution hi dena hai mujhe aapko to.
Executive: Are madam dekho computer se farak padta ho to matlab mai computer se chalu karu wo wali baat hai.
Customer: Accha accha accha mai aapko usi ke liye bata rahi hu computer se farak padta hai dekhiye process me kya hota hai ki jaise koi bhi lead portal pe aati hai theek hai buyer ne dali aur by lead ke bucket me dikhi to aapke paas jab tak mail jata hai na already system pe wo lead live ho jati hai aur uske time me agar aapke competitor ne staff agar unka koi bhi ya khud bhi wo owner active hai kaafi to agar ek by lead maximum paanch supplier ne agar consume kar li hai to sixth supplier ko chhata supplier wo visible bhi nahi kar payega lead nahi uske by lead bucket pe dikhegi even aapko agar mail bhi aaya hoga na uska ya notification aaya hoga to aap jab click karoge to wo lead aapko page pe land karke leke jayegi then usme dikha dega aapko sold out.
Customer: To dikkat aapko na wo jo problem aa rahi hai wo waha se aa rahi hai aur mai aapko abhi ek lead bhejti hu mere paas jo yaha par dikh raha hai do teen lead aap batana ye kya relevant hai aapke liye ki nahi maine dekho aapko ek lead share kari hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aapka minimum quantity jo hai wo kitna rehta hai isme?
Executive: 5000 haa hai meri kaam ki hai.
Customer: Ye kaam ki hai na to ye ek ghante pehle ki lead thi ab ye consume ho gayi hai jaldi aur ho sakta hai ye aapne us time dekhna na ho ya fir aapne usme matlab app nahi open kara ho ya ho sakta hai ki aapke paas notification aaya ho but aapne click kara ho to click karte hi aapko sold out.
Executive: Laps ho gayi.
Customer: Haan haan exactly ab mai mai aapko bhi do teen aur dikhati hu to hum agar na sir time bhi sahi kar lenge to bhi hume output achcha nikal aayega aisa nahi hai ki aapko kuch investment karna hai ya fir aapko kuch usme aur kuch aur lagana padega tab ja kar ke kuch achcha output milega hum bas time sahi karke bhi nikal sakte hai. Ab mai aapko abhi timing bhi aapko bhejti hu ki aapka timing chal ke aa raha hai taaki.
Executive: Haan madam mai to yu manta hu ki aap jaise bataoge mai waisa kar dunga aap mere ko proper hindi me bata do ki bhaiya is time computer pe aap ye chalao to aapko aisa business milega apne ko koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm matlab wahi ki aapka agar koi staff ho na bas lead consumption aap at least unse karwa lo aur turant turant aapko wo detail bhej de aapke whatsapp pe kaise bhi ki aapke lead.
Executive: Ab jaise ye dekho ye jo aapko dikh raha hai na Beniganj 2 20000 square meter hai matlab 2 lakh square feet ki lead hai ab ye laps ho chuki dikhta hai.
Customer: Haan ye laps yaha pe aap agar system pe dekhoge to dikh jayega matlab phone me mujhe option dhundhwana padega puchna padega team se ki phone app me wo past lead ka section hai ki nahi hai but aap apne system pe jaoge to aapko ye sari lead jo mai dikha rahi hu wo aapko khud dikhegi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To aap agar na koi bhi apna friend me hai ya koi bhi aapke staff me unke at least lead consume karane ke liye aap rakh lijiye system pe baki jo aage ka discussion hai wo aap hi kariye buyer se taaki on time lead consume ho paegi aapke end se.
Executive: Theek hai madam mai ek kaam karta hu wahi chalu karta hu. Computer se chalu karta hu timing bhi bhej do aap ek bar kis time pe karna hai.
Customer: Ye ye dekho aapko maine bhej diya hai aap ek bar niche wala screenshot check kar lo ye aapka usme timing ka dikha raha hai jo mai aapko bata rahi thi ki November ka 42% hai October ka 50% hai mai aapke agar competitor ka bhi ek do ka bhi nikal ke bhej dungi aapko kyuki wo kahi na kahi kuch usme leader bhi hai baki aapki tarah kuch aur staff bhi chala rahe hai to wo bhi usi tarike se apne kaafi matlab kuch ho sakta hai staff ko rakha unhone wo bhi active honge staff ko paisa isi baat ka to mil raha hai ki aap full India mart pe active rahiye lead consume kariye usme mujhe usme se nikal ke dijiye sale hai na to wo cheeze hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap apne level pe ye cheeze aur ek aur mai aapko isko batati hu aap abhi jo use kar rahe ho by lead ka section consume karne ke liye usme kya filters kuch use karte hai aap order value ka ya product wise.
Executive: Haan madam matlab mai India filter ke baad me Kota stones to plus yahi dekhta hu.
Customer: Theek hai aur usme order value ka bhi filter lagate ho kya aap?
Executive: Order value ka to nahi lagata hu madam.
Customer: Aap usme na order value ka laga loge to usse kya hoga ki jo aapko ye chhoti moti lead bhi dikh rahi hai na wo seedhe seedhe waha se hat jayegi mai aapko abhi ek screenshot bheja hai maine.
Executive: Haan ye order value above 1 lakh laga liya ab jaise above 1 lakh lagaya kuch aa hi nahi rahi khali ho gaya wahi pura portal hi.
Customer: Nahi mere paas to yaha pe dikh raha hai ek granite slab ki kuch lead dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Mere ko abhi phone me show nahi kar rahi shayad pata nahi kyu mai aapko screenshot dal deta hu aap dekh lijiye.
Customer: Ye maine isi liye hai waise mere paas bhi aisa kuch nahi bahut sari hai but wahi hai ki bulk lead bahut jaldi consume ho gayi hongi mai aapko ek chart bhi dikhati hu jisme hamare paas overall lead dikhata hai usme retail bhi mix hoga mai aapko dikhati hu ek minute chart aur humne kitna consume kara na is month ka wo bhi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap dekho ye ye overall flow hai leads ka jo maine abhi aapko bheja hai aap dekhoge agar Kota stone me abhi tak hamare November ke month me 373 lead aayi hai 373 me mai maan leti hu ki agar 100 ya 150 lead retail wali bhi hongi ya fir maan leti hu 200 hongi to bhi hamare paas kahi na kahi 100 ya 150 ki lead to bulk hongi hongi kuch hum 100 to kam se kam kar payenge mera kehne ka matlab ye hai hai na to wo cheez hum agar dekh rahe hai to hum 39 hi lead consume kar paaye abhi is month ka.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai madam mai ek kaam karta hu isko system se chalu karta hu ek do din fir aapko call karta hu aapka number save kar leta hu theek hai.
Customer: Save kar lijiyega aap aur mujhe kuch output jaisa bhi aapko lage bataiyega aur kuch issue hai to aap mujhe connect kar lena Rishabh ne is not satisfied ka feedback diya tha Rishabh ji ki services ko lekar ke to us part pe mai waha pe ye close kar du concern kyuki mere paas aaya tha to service ke liye isliye maine aap se discuss kara ki aapko kya kya dikkat aa rahi hai Rishabh client se to aap theek hai na madam abhi.
Customer: Haan service ke aap mera number save kar lijiye to service part me jaise agar aapko dikkat aaye aur Rishabh ji aapko guidance us according aapko nahi ok lage to aap mujhe bhi connect kar sakte ho.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai to mai ye concern aapka ye not satisfied wala close kar du Rishabh ji ke end se jo aapne diya tha.
Executive: Haan madam mai ek bar dekh leta hu isko paanch minute dijiye theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai aap mujhe dekh lijiye mai isko close kar deti hu theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not effectively consuming buyleads.

- Wants to know about tender filing process.

- Customer gave a 'not satisfied' feedback for services.



Resolution:

- Executive shared tips to improve lead consumption.

- Explained the tender filing process.

- Executive will close the 'not satisfied' feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will start using the system.

- Customer will call after a few days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, tenders, feedback
